view.name: ControlTemplate
view.custom-handler: #Your custom logic, you have access to: # The 'event' object # The 'snapshot' object # And the EntityManager if snapshot.isDeleted != '': for i in range(1,int(snapshot.templateVersion.replace("-PREVIEW",""))): entity = EntityManager.get(type="ControlTemplate", key=snapshot.arn + ":" + str(i)) entity.mark_for_deletion = True

view.name: Country
view.custom-handler: for country in snapshot.countries.values(): arn = snapshot.arn + ":country:" + country.code entity = EntityManager.get(type="Country", key=arn) entity.arn = arn entity.name = country.name entity.code = country.code entity.regionArn = snapshot.arn if snapshot.isDeleted != '': entity.mark_for_deletion = True

view.name: User
view.custom-handler: entity = EntityManager.get(type="User", key=snapshot.username) index = f"{snapshot.username} {snapshot.firstName} {snapshot.lastName} {snapshot.email}" entity.searchIndex = index.lower() if snapshot.isDeleted != '' or snapshot.active == False: entity.mark_for_deletion = True

view.name: RiskTemplate
Company
view.custom-handler: #Your custom logic, you have access to: # The 'event' object # The 'snapshot' object # And the EntityManager entity = EntityManager.get(type="Company", key=snapshot.arn) entity.arn = snapshot.arn entity.name = snapshot.name entity.description = snapshot.description entity.companySize = snapshot.companySize entity.revenue = snapshot.revenue entity.industryLink = list(set(snapshot.industryLink)) entity.countryArn = snapshot.countryArn entity.controlFrameworkLink = list(set(snapshot.controlFrameworkLinks)) entity.logoPath = snapshot.logoPath entity.businessUnits = [{ "name": value["name"], "description": value["description"] } for value in snapshot.businessUnits.values()] if snapshot.isDeleted != '': entity.mark_for_deletion = True

view.name: Employee

mapping.template: { "uuid": value["uuid"] if "uuid" in value else "", "message": value["message"] if "message" in value else "", "user": value["user"] if "user" in value else "", "order": value["order"] if "order" in value else "", }

{ "timestamp": value["timestamp"] if "timestamp" in value else "", "description": value["description"] if "description" in value else "", "user": value["user"] if "user" in value else "", "userProfile": value[""] if "" in value else "", }
{ "arn": value["arn"] if "arn" in value else "", "impactOnRisk": value["impactOnRisk"] if "impactOnRisk" in value else "", "control": value[""] if "" in value else "", }
{ "type": value["type"] if "type" in value else "", "description": value["description"] if "description" in value else "", }

projection.name: FetchEligibleControl
projection.code: from draftsman.ViewStoreApi import Query|LB|from datetime import date, datetime|LB|from math import ceil|LB|from dateutil.relativedelta import relativedelta|LB||LB||LB|def transform(arguments, username):|LB| # You have access to the username of the requestor and the arguments.|LB| print(f"Fetch eligible controls [{arguments}/{username}]")|LB| relative = float(arguments["relativeTime"])|LB| result = []|LB| today = date.today()|LB| items = Query("Control").get_items(filter_chain_method="or").not_exists("hasPendingSelfAssessment").equals("hasPendingSelfAssessment", False).run()|LB| |LB| print(items)|LB| for item in items:|LB| try:|LB| next = datetime.strptime(item["nextAssessmentDate"], "%Y-%m-%d")|LB| periodicity = item["assessmentPeriodicity"]|LB| |LB| if periodicity.endswith("D"):|LB| days = ceil(int(periodicity.replace("D", "")) / relative)|LB| delta = relativedelta(days=days)|LB| elif periodicity.endswith("M"):|LB| weeks = ceil(int(periodicity.replace("M", "")) * 4 / relative)|LB| delta = relativedelta(weeks=weeks)|LB| elif periodicity.endswith("Y"):|LB| months = ceil(int(periodicity.replace("Y", "")) * 12 / relative)|LB| delta = relativedelta(months=months)|LB| |LB| reminder_date = next - delta|LB| if reminder_date.date() <= today:|LB| result.append(item)|LB| except KeyError:|LB| result.append(item)|LB||LB| return result|LB|

projection.name: SearchProfile
projection.code: |LB|from draftsman.ViewStoreApi import Query|LB||LB||LB|def transform(arguments, username):|LB| |LB| print(f"Handle graph request [{arguments}/{username}]")|LB| search = arguments["searchString"]|LB| |LB| query = Query('User').get_items()|LB| for word in search.lower().split(" "):|LB| query = query.contains("searchIndex",word)|LB| results = query.run()|LB||LB| return [{|LB| "key": result["username"],|LB| "username": result["username"],|LB| "firstName": result["firstName"],|LB| "lastName": result["lastName"]|LB| } for result in results]

projection.name: FetchEligibleRisk
projection.code: from draftsman.ViewStoreApi import Query|LB|from datetime import date, datetime|LB|from math import ceil|LB|from dateutil.relativedelta import relativedelta|LB||LB||LB|def transform(arguments, username):|LB| # You have access to the username of the requestor and the arguments.|LB| print(f"Fetch eligible risks [{arguments}/{username}]")|LB| relative = float(arguments["relativeTime"])|LB| result = []|LB| today = date.today()|LB| items = Query("Risk").get_items(filter_chain_method="or").not_exists("hasPendingSelfAssessment").equals("hasPendingSelfAssessment", False).run()|LB| |LB| print(items)|LB| for item in items:|LB| try:|LB| next = datetime.strptime(item["nextAssessmentDate"], "%Y-%m-%d")|LB| periodicity = item["assessmentPeriodicity"]|LB| |LB| if periodicity.endswith("D"):|LB| days = ceil(int(periodicity.replace("D", "")) / relative)|LB| delta = relativedelta(days=days)|LB| elif periodicity.endswith("M"):|LB| weeks = ceil(int(periodicity.replace("M", "")) * 4 / relative)|LB| delta = relativedelta(weeks=weeks)|LB| elif periodicity.endswith("Y"):|LB| months = ceil(int(periodicity.replace("Y", "")) * 12 / relative)|LB| delta = relativedelta(months=months)|LB| |LB| reminder_date = next - delta|LB| if reminder_date.date() <= today:|LB| result.append(item)|LB| except KeyError:|LB| result.append(item)|LB||LB| return result|LB|

activity.code: flow.eligible = flow.active == False and "@" in flow.username|LB|flow.sender = "no-reply@draftsman.io"|LB|flow.receiver = flow.username|LB|flow.subject = "Colleagues are reaching out in Anove"|LB|flow.text = "Create an account at https://anovedemo.github.io"|LB|flow.html = flow.text

activity.code: import re|LB||LB|flow.key = flow.uri.split("/")[1]|LB||LB|# Case: if it is a tenant css|LB|if re.match("^[a-z]+$",flow.key) and flow.uri.endswith("custom.css"):|LB| flow.group = "administrator"|LB| flow.type = "tenant-css"|LB|# Case: if it is a tenant logo|LB|elif re.match("^[a-z]+$", flow.key) and flow.uri.endswith("/logo.png"):|LB| flow.group = "administrator"|LB| flow.type = "tenant-logo"|LB|# Case: if it is a integration logo|LB|elif re.match("^integration:[a-z]+$", flow.key) and flow.uri.endswith("/logo.png"):|LB| flow.group = "administrator"|LB| flow.type = "integration-logo"|LB|# Case: if it is a company logo|LB|elif re.match("^[a-z]+:company:[a-z]+$",flow.key) and flow.uri.endswith("/logo.png"):|LB| flow.group = flow.key + ":administrator"|LB| flow.type = "company-logo"|LB|# Case: unknown file|LB|else:|LB| raise ValueError('Unanticipated file path')|LB| |LB|# Check if the user has the correct authorization|LB|if not Cognito.check_if_user_is_in_group(flow.group,flow.username):|LB| raise ValueError("User has not the correct authorization " + flow.group +" is needed.")|LB| |LB|# Check if the correct bucket was selected|LB|if not "-web-" in flow.bucket:|LB| raise ValueError("This function only reacts to public uploads.")

activity.name: template

activity.query: mutation MyMutation {|LB| Company {|LB| Risk {|LB| create(input: {|LB| arn: "{{flow.arn}}", |LB| name: "{{flow.template.get.name}}", |LB| description: "{{flow.template.get.description}}", |LB| grossLikelihood: {{flow.template.get.grossLikelihood}}, |LB| grossImpact: {{flow.template.get.grossImpact}}, |LB| apetiteLikelihood: {{flow.apetiteLikelihood}}, |LB| apetiteImpact: {{flow.apetiteImpact}}, |LB| reviewPeriodicity: "{{flow.template.get.reviewPeriodicity}}", |LB| nextReviewDate: "{{flow.nextReviewDate}}", |LB| owner: "{{flow.owner}}",|LB| controlLinks: [], |LB| treatmentPlan: []}) {|LB| correlationId|LB| }|LB| }|LB| }|LB|}|LB|
activity.name: result

activity.query: query MyQuery {|LB| ControlTemplate {|LB| get(key: "{{flow.controlTemplateReference}}") {|LB| assessmentPeriodicity|LB| description|LB| name|LB| requirementArns|LB| templateVersion|LB| }|LB| }|LB|}
activity.name: template

activity.query: query MyQuery {|LB| Company {|LB| get(key: "{{flow.companyArn}}") {|LB| controlframework {|LB| requirements {|LB| arn|LB| }|LB| }|LB| }|LB| }|LB|}
activity.name: eligibleRequirements

activity.code: flow.template = flow.template["data"]["ControlTemplate"]|LB|flow.requirements = []|LB|for x in flow.eligibleRequirements["data"]["Company"]["get"]["controlframework"]:|LB| for y in x["requirements"]:|LB| flow.requirements.append(y["arn"])|LB|flow.links = ";".join(|LB| [|LB| x|LB| for x in flow.template["get"]["requirementArns"]|LB| if x in flow.requirements|LB| ]|LB|)

activity.query: mutation MyMutation {|LB| Company {|LB| Control {|LB| create(input: {name: "{{flow.template.get.name}}", description: "{{flow.template.get.description}}", assessmentPeriodicity: "{{flow.template.get.assessmentPeriodicity}}", desiredMaturityLevel: {{flow.desiredMaturityLevel}}, businessUnit: "{{flow.businessUnit}}", companyArn: "{{flow.companyArn}}", requirements: "{{flow.links}}", nextAssessmentDate: "{{flow.nextAssessmentDate}}", controlOwner: "{{flow.controlOwner}}", controlTemplateArn: "{{flow.controlTemplateReference}}"}) {|LB| correlationId|LB| }|LB| }|LB| }|LB|}|LB|
activity.name: result

activity.code:
flow.sender = "no-reply@draftsman.io"|LB|flow.receiver = "anove-support@endtest-mail.io"|LB|flow.subject = "New integration request"|LB|flow.text = "There is a new integration request: " + flow.arn|LB|flow.text += "
It references: " + flow.reference|LB|flow.text += "

" + flow.requirements|LB|flow.html = flow.text

activity.description: Check if the template is created
Check if a new preview is created
Check that the released template is unaltered
Check if the task is created
Assert that the objective view is filled
Check if the update was successfull
Try to reopen the objective with an update command, this should fail.
Use the reopen command again, this should fail
Check if the objective is completed for 90%
Check if objective task is linked
Assert that the assessment is created
Assert that a task is created
Assert that the task is updated
Assert that there is no pending self assessment
Check that the framework was updated

input.name: industryDecription
input.value: Software development, IT services, and technology innovation.

activity.description: Creating a company also creates roles and grant's them to the current user
Make sure that we are user 1
Check if the released version is unaltered
Check if a new preview version is added
Assert that the business unit description is updated
Try to add a duplicate business unit
Try to update a non existing business unit
Check that the asset is created
Check that the asset is updated
Try to update the task again
